verse.lines: Gaaka - prakaashimpa jeyumu nee mukha kaantini maapai

titles.title: 290.Geetam geetam jaya jaya || గీతం గీతం జయ జయ

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: Pallavi : Geetam geetam jaya jaya geetam

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: A. P. : Yesu raaju lechenu Halleluya

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: Badenu - andu vesina mudra, kaavali nilchenaa

verse.name: V16
verse.lines: Parugidiri - inka doota ganamula dwanini vinuchu

verse.name: V19
verse.lines: Veerudu raaga mee mela thaala vaadyamul

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Pallavi : Lechinaaduraa samaadhi gelichinaaduraa yesu lechinaaduraa samaadhi gelichi naaduraa

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: A. P. : Lethunani thaa jeppinatlu - lekhanamulo paliki natlu“Lechi”

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Bhadramugaa samaadhi paini - pedda raatini yunchiri bhatulu - mudravesi raatriyantha nidraleka kaavaliyunna “Lechi”

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Prabhuvu doota paramunundi - thwaragaa digi raatini porlinchi bhalira daanipai koorchunde - bhayamu nonda kaavalivaaru “Lechi”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Proddu podavaka munde sreelu - siddaparachina sugandhamunu shradda thoda thechi yesuku -

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 4. Chooda vellina sreelanu doota - choochi yapude

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: 6. Nenu chese panula nerugu - nenu nadiche

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: Maarga merugu - nenu cheppu maata lerugu -

verse.name: V18
verse.lines: Nammu kondu thaanu naalo yundi nanduna -

verse.name: V20
verse.lines: 8. Paapa bhaaramu ledu manaku - marana bhayamu ledu

verse.name: V23
verse.lines: 9. Yesu nande rakshana bhaagyam - yesu nande

verse.name: V24
verse.lines: Nitya jeevam - yesu nande aatma shaanti -

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Sresta geethamu vinabadu chunnadi yesu

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: Gotta baden - aa gandu donganu siluvalo

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: 3. Heena maina eete toda prakkana grutcha

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: Baden - aa paavana magu rakhta oota

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Low in the grave He lay

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: Choochi malli thana kaanthi - hrudul naayanan

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: Chintha veedi santasaana vangi kristu neduta

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: Pallavi : Kristu leche Halleluya - leche jayasheeludu

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 2. Kristu leche mandalapu - chinta yantha theerenu

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: Harsha dwaara moppa deesi - malli jeeva mondenu chaavu

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: Narakaalu mrokki - dootalella galvanu - kotlu chuttu

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: 3. Kristu leche naati vantha - yantha yantha mondenu needu

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: Goppa harshamaaye - kristu lechi nandunan shudda bhoo

verse.name: V17
verse.lines: 4. Kristu leche ! ninka chaavu ! narakaala bhayamu

verse.name: V18
verse.lines: Lene ledu ! kristu nandu nanni gelchinaaramu

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Christ the Lord is risen today !

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: 4. Kristu lechinappudu - chaavu mullu thrunchenu - ellavaarin brochunu -

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: 5. Yesu mruti gelchenu - memu kooda gelthumu - yesudundu chotaku - memu kooda bothumu

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: 6. Bhoomi naakasambulo - yesu, neeku stotramu - mruthyu samhaarakunda -

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Yishu Raja aega firishton ke sath aega

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 1. Yesuraju vachunu dootalatho vachchunu daasula paramuna jerchutaku yesuni mukha jyotini Juchedamu jaya dwanulache nuppengadamu “Yesu”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 2. Sanga vadhuvu pendli kumarundesutho - mangala geethamu padumu naadu mahimalo manamu paadedamu yesu snehampu lothunu ruchiyintumu “Yesu”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 3. Mudra nondhi shuddulu tellanangi darinchi shuddhuni mungita nilichedaru naadu swama kireetamu daalchi andu paaduchu prakaasinchedamu “Yesu”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 4. Yesune preminchiti - loka sneham veediti sadaa naa yesutho muchatintun Aaha! bhaasillu mahimatho muchatintun

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 5. Paraloka booradwani mrogagane - parishuddulegiri velledaru aa satyuni kalyana vindulo manamesutho narbhatinchedamu “Yesu”

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Raajaadhi raajaa raave - raaju yesu raajyamela raave

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Vairaajulaku raajuvai raave - ravikoti teja yesu raave

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Badal ki sawari kar ke kisi din

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: Paapamula nedabaapun prabhu yese ninu rakshinchun “Me”

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: Yesutho nega nayathamaa ? kristese - neekai - raagan “Me”

titles.title: 299.Prabhuni raakada eediname || ప్రభుని రాకడ ఈ దినమే

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Prabhuni raakada eediname - parulidi randi sudiname

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: A. P. : Paramunandundi mana prabhuvu - dharaku narugunu

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 1. Siddulagu vaarin - mana Yesu - shuddijeyu nilan -

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 2. Swaramutho vachun - adhikaari - mahimatho maralun - thana

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: Doota - soorya chandru nilan thaaralatho jeekatul kammun

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: Prabhu raaka - pagalu raatri yagun - thwara padumu “Prabhu”

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: 3. Modata lethuru sajeevulai - prabhuni yandundu - aa

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: Mruthulu marala andaramu aa dwanitho - paramu jerudumu

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: 4. Veyyi yendlu paalinchedaru priyuni - raajyamuna priyulu,

verse.name: V16
verse.lines: Saayam samayamuna - cheri nemali kokilalu raajun -

verse.name: V18
verse.lines: 5. Gorre mekalunu - aa chirutha simha jaatulunu oka chota

verse.name: V19
verse.lines: Bedhamu leka barundi garika meyunu - aa vela kalisi

verse.name: V21
verse.lines: 6. Nyaya neetulan - mana prabhuvu - khaayamuga delpun aa

verse.name: V23
verse.lines: Yesunaku dwajameththi chaati yesunaku - o priyudaa “Prabhu”

titles.title: 300.Mahimayutudu maa yesu raju || మహిమయుతుడు మా యేసు రాజు

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Meghamumeeda Yesuraju vega milaku vachchun

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: A. P. : Sidhamuga nunduvarala jerchunu sheegramugaa digunu

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 1. Prabhuvu thaane aarbhaatamutho ee bhuviki vachchun

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: Ikkada nammina vaaralu eguruchu ee bhuvi vidachedaru

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 2. Kristu nandu mrutulagu vaaru lechi velluduru

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 3. Vela velagu aayana maatalu raakanu delpenu

verse.name: V19
verse.lines: 6. Veyi yendlu yesu ilalo raajyamu yelunu

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Sodarulaaraa lendi raakada gurtulu choodandi !

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 1. Ardaraatri velalo - prabhu raakada dwani mrogenu -

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: Kannulu terachi chooduma prabhu vachchu vellaaye “Sodaru”

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: 4. Chedarina yoodulu swadesaaniki cherute yoka soochana

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Saza paenge, han ji mar khaenge

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Yesu raagaane sangamu-marpu cheyabadi paikettabadunu

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: Kada boora mrogagane - sri Yesu raagaane “Yesu”

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: Nedama prakka jerchun - sri Yesu teerpulo “Yesu”

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: Vachunu sri Yesu - sri Yesu dutalatho “Yesu”

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 2. Yesu namame yento priyamu - dukitula - kasraya namam

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 3. Ramyamainadi - yesuni namam - manashanti - nichu namam

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 4. Ysu namame - sakthi kaladi - prabhu peruna - bhootamu tolagen

titles.title: 336.Eyana mata vinudi - needu || ఈయన మాట వినుడి - నేడు

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Eyana mata vinudi - needu - Eyane naa priya Kumarudu

verse.lines: 1. Eyane naa priya kumaarudu - shapamutirchedu paparahitudu

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 3. Mahima gala raaju maata nichchenu - Ihamandayana

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: 1. Papamunaku jeetamu maranamu O papi bhayapadavaa ?

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 2. Lokasukhamu nammaku nammaku - aa ichchalu maayamagu

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: Daivakopamu vachutaku munddu - nee rakshkuni cherumu “Yesu”

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: O paapi neevu parugidiraa - deva deevenala pondumu “Yesu”

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Parugidara sodaruda - prabhu sannidi neevu jerutakai

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Sun lo mere bhaiyo masihji mera

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Vinudi sodarulaaraa - na Yesu prabhu ilaketenchen

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: A. P. : Preethito prabhuni cherudi prabhula prabhuve

verse.name: V11

verse.lines: Nitya jeeva miyyavachenu, nee koraku vachchenu

verse.lines: 6. Needu papamu nantatini neevu nikkamuga noppukonina

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Iruku margambulo pravesinchu varu kondare

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 4. Repu needi yagunaa marana vela theliyunaa ?

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: Antha paapa madhikamai deva bhakti thaggunu “Krupa”

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: 6. Donga bhakhti veeduchu boothu bhaasha viduchuchu

verse.name: V17
verse.lines: 7. Enni maarlu rakshana vaartha viniyu nammaka

verse.name: V19
verse.lines: 8. Vyaadhi shramalu maranamo veru etti kastamo

verse.lines: Yundunatlu daiva krupa ponda yesunu cheru “Krupa”

titles.title: 343.Prabhu Yesuke jayamanipaadu || ప్రభు యేసుకే జయమని పాడు

titles.title: 344.Caluvarilo vimukhti - kaligeno priyundaa || కలువరిలో విముక్తి - కలిగెనో ప్రియుండా

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Paapa merugani Yesu - paapamuga jeyabadi shaapambu vahinchi - shramala sahinchenu “Caluvari”

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Paada hastamula nundi - prakka gaayamu nundi pravahinchenu punya - pranayaamrutha dhaara “Caluvari”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Prabhu Yesuni rakhtame - premaamrutha dhaara priyamaaraga thraagu - prabhusannidhijeri “Caluvari”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 4. Ghana premanu joopi - thana rakhtamucheta thaane kadugunu - mana paapamu nantha “Caluvari”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 5. Sarva janulaku - suvaartha nandinchi sariyainatti daari - joopinthumu vega “Caluvari”

verse.lines: Prabhu Yesu kristu meeku - prashaanthi nitchunu randi “Praja”

verse.name: V3

verse.lines: A. P. : Vachuvarala troyanani - nechelu desu vakku nichenu

verse.lines: Sadguru charanamu vedakina - sadgunamuga ninnu maarchunu

verse.lines: Needu papamula kshamimpanu - naadu desudu silva nekkenu

verse.lines: Jeeva devadi devudu neekai - cheyunadella parikimpanu

verse.name: V22
verse.lines: Tappudu boda cheyuvarala - veedi paramunu jeranichataku

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Yishu ka lohu anupam hai jo

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: Ee jagatin priyudaa preminche ee jagatin - siluvalo

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: 3. Vinumu sodaraa prabhu Yesu kristuni - paraloka

verse.name: V20
verse.lines: Yesuni amoolya rakhta dhaarale kadugunu paapamellapriyudaa

verse.name: V23
verse.lines: Mondedavaa ? Priyudaa prayaasa mondedavaa ? paapamoppukoni Yesu paadamula chentaku jerumu- priyudaa chentaku jerumu “Saati”

verse.name: V24
verse.lines: 6. Gatinchu chunnadi swalpa jeevitamu - sheegrahmugaa rammu priyudaa sheegrahmugaa rammu - kartha Yesu nandu viswaasamunchi rakshana

verse.name: V26
verse.lines: 7. Krupayaanandamu pavitra premalo - bhaagamu pondumu - priyudaa bhaagamu pondumu - paapa saagaramunu daatincha galadu Yesu rakshakudepriyudaa

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Rakshana nosagedu Yesuni premanu lakshyamu cheyumu o priyudaa akshaya raajyamu neeyanu vachina - rakshakun bogadumu snehithudaa

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Lokapu premanu yemani thelpeda - nee kavamaanambe dalachinacho maarani Yesuni rakshakun prema - dhaakudu nondumu o priyudaa “Rakshana”

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Paapapu premalo viduvaka nilichina - thaapamu chendeda vo narudaa paapini gaavanu prema swaroopudu - shaapamu norchenu calvarilo “Rakshana”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Chachchina paapini vedaki rakshimpa - chachchi brathikina ghanu devadu vachina paapini vaddani throyani - nishchala premaa mayudu Yese “Rakshana”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: Nondedavu nijamu namminacho prabhu premanu gaanavu - nammumu prabhu prema neediname “Rakshana”

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 5. Ghana dhani kula matha soundharyambulan - gaanavu nija premaa dharanal ennila nunnanu niluchune nityamu - pennuga pondumu prabhu preman “Rakshana”

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 6. Tandri kumaara shuddatmala chittamun - dandiga neraverchuchu ghanulu endaro negiri pondanu

verse.name: V14

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Maya moh men dhokha na khao turn

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Maya lokamu - mosapokumu - yesunande rakshana dorukunu neeku

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Bandumitrulu - bhaarya biddalu - danamu ganamu andachandamu avi anniyunu - neetibudagale samaadnithone samaaptamouvunu “Maya”

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Padaga vippina - paamuvale nee - papamu ninnu vembadinchunu paapa phalitamu - maranamegadaa daani antamu nityanarakamu “Maya”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Ninnu rakshimpanenchi prabhuvu - paramunu vidichi - dharaku vachchenu neeku badulugaa - shramala norchenu - siluvalone baliyaye nesu “Maya”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 4. Eppudainanu - oppukonumika - nee paapa jeevitamu nanthayu ninnu kshaminchunu krupato prabhuvu - idiye nee rakshana dinamugaa “Maya”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 5. Dehamantha prabhu gaayamul ponde - parisudda rakthamunu karchenu - nitya jeevamu neeku neeyanu -

verse.lines: 1. Ee jagatiketenchi raktamu kaarchi - baligaa narpinchukonen

verse.name: V15

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 4. Nenu na inti varalamu – yehovane sevinchedamu

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: 5. Padipoyina Nee balipeetamun – saricheyutaku neevu siddama

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: Israelu devuni vedina – agni moolamuga badulitchunu

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: 6. Intha varaku ninnu nadipina – Ebinejaraina nee devuni

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: Neevu marachi jeevinchinacho – neeku nemmadiye undadu

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: Cheviti vari chevula vinajesen verevvaru kadu

verse.name: V21
verse.lines: Maraninchi thirigi lechenu – ninu paramunu chercha

verse.name: V22
verse.lines: Prabhu yese neeku margamu - verevvaru leru

titles.title: 381.Yesuni chentaku aashatho rammila || యేసుని చెంతకు ఆశతో రమ్మిల

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16 V17

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: A. P. : Idiye mikkili anukoola samayamu -

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 1. Papula koraku mana prabhu Yesu pranamu pettenaya (2)

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: Daana darmamulu teerdayaatralu papamul bapavaya Yesuni

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: 3. Yesuni namamu pavana namamu papamul bapunaya ee

verse.name: V16
verse.lines: Tarunamu daatina mari ikaraadu - maranamu thappadaya

titles.title: 382.Idiye anukula samayamu neeku || ఇదియే అనుకూల సమయము నీకు

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: Pallavi : Idiye anukula samayamu neeku - gana rakshana dinamu

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: A. P. : Aatankamu leka Yesu nangikarinchi chateda melladalan

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 1. Aayana raakada bahu sameepamani vaakyamu vraasiyunnadi

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 2. Mathai iruvadi naalugava adyaayamu Marku badamoodunu

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: Luka eruvadiyokata vadyayamu - chuda mugimpu theliyun “Idiye”

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 3. Yuddamulu bhuvi jaruguchu nunnavi - daivachittamu jarugun

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: Maranamula sankya hechchu chunnadi - nagarulu vanikedunu “Idiye”

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: 4. Devudu raagaa naakamu marunu - bhoomi dahanamagunu

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: Neellu samudramu linkipovu - yesu thirigi raagan “Idiye”

verse.name: V16
verse.lines: Velaleni rakshana kalgu saampadyamu - samsayulaku ledu “Idiye”

verse.name: V17
verse.lines: 6. Kaalamu vyardhamu cheyaku dharalo - karmamu pattukonaku

verse.name: V19
verse.lines: 7. Halleluya padi yellaraku thelupa - nellarato koodanu

verse.name: V20
verse.lines: Twaragaa raabovu Yesunu sandhimpa - aayaththa padumu vega “Idiye”

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Idiye samayambu randi Yesuni jerandi

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Ika samayamu ledandi randi rakshana pondandi

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16 V17

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Maya moh aur lobh men bhai

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: 5. Yesu nene margam satyam jeevamu nene

titles.title: 385.Vinathi vinathi vinathi triyekuniki || వినతి వినతి వినతి త్రియేకునికి

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 1. Kopadinamunu thappinchukonutaku - ye pani chesitivi baadhalu ninnu cheraka yundunu - naaduni kanugonina “Vina”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 2. Ichchala nellanu ilalo vidachi - nechelu desunu nammu

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 3. Kayamastiramu kalamu nilvadu mayakshiti mayamagun dasudaa kalamu vyardamu cheyaka - yesu nangikarimpumu “Vina”

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 4. Rakshakudesunu siluvalo ganumu - rakshimpa badiyedavu jeevamu satyamu margamu chetuvu- daivastutiniyandu “Vina”

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 5. Rakshaku dasrayadurgamu vaidyudu - rakishana srungamu kota mintanu devudu bandayu kedemu-junteteneyu naayane “Vina”

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 6. Manchikapari neratamu kachu - nanchitamuga nadupun jayamu nichun throsiyeyaka - priyamuto parugidaraa “Vina”

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: 7. Halleluya pata narbatamuto - nellaraku chatumu thwaragaa rajuvachchunu bhuviki dhustula nanachutakai “Vina”

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Kaalaviluva neeku teliyaka poyina - kanneeru karchedavu

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: A. P. : Bhuvilo Yesu ninnunchina yuddesamu bhaavamandu thalachi Yesuche jeevinchumu

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 1. Istaprakaramu manasu veedi nadachi - kopa patruda vaguduve Rakshanya jeevitamondi santoshincha nanugraha kaalamide yani thelisi “Kala”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 2. Ihamandu sevaku Yesu ninnu pilche - nani thelisikonumu ghanamaina panini marachi nidrinchina pagalu gatinchaga nika nemi chetuvu “Kala”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 3. Novahu kaalamuna noota iruvadi yendlu choochi lokamunu nashimpa jesenu krupatho neekidina aayussu ee etithone mugisina “Kala”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 4. Mundu Irmiyaa Hananyaaku thelipina - etane mrutipondenu ye samayamu neeku sontha manakumu - ee etane neevu maranichavachunu “Kala”

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Prabhu Yesu pilupunu O priyudaa pedachevini pettedavaa - theermaanamu cheyakane velledavaa- prabhu sannidhilo nundi

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Letha vayassu nadipraayamunu - gathinchi povunavi mannayinadi venukativalene - marala bhoomiki,cherun aatma daani dayachesina - devuni yoddaku povun aa lokamulo nee mundu gathi emouno erigithivaa “Prabhu”

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Epaatidi nee jeevitha mantha - epaatidi nee thanuvu gaddi puvvutho samamidi yera - adiye nee jeevitamu

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: Antalona maayamu agu - vintha budagaye kadaa antalona anthardhanambagu aaviri ye kadaa “Prabhu”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 3. Vyardhamu vyardhamu sarvamu ilalo - idiye Yesuni maata niluvani needa ee lokomuraa - kalushaathma kanugonaraa lokamantha sampaadinchi - lobhee nee praanamunu nasta parachu konina neeku narudaa laabhamu kaladaa “Prabhu”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 4. Thaamasincha thagadika neeku - thakshaname thirugumuraa virigi naligi hrudayamu kaligi - vinayamutho prabhu jeri yesu prabhuni siluva chenta - Yesuni rakhtamu kori pralaapinchi needu sakala paapamu noppukonumaa “Prabhu”

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 5. Nee rakshanakai nilichenu Yesu - thana rakhta dhaaralatho

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: Kadugunu ninnu kshamiyinchunu - vadigaa ee kshanamande nee naamamunu paralokamulo - nede vraasi yunchun

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: Sahinchi praanamide nee koraku - parugidi rammu “Prema”

verse.name: V19
verse.lines: Nee rakshana koraku - nede nee rakshana dinamu -

verse.name: V21
verse.lines: 6. Thane kadugunu thana rakhtamutho - thandri vale

verse.name: V24
verse.lines: 7. Prema vaartha prakatincha bade - priyudu Yesuni

titles.title: 389.Immuga nee hrudaya nimmu || ఇమ్ముగ నీ హృదయము నిమ్ము

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16 V17 V18

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Pallavi : Immuga nee hrudaya nimmu - immanen

titles.title: 390.O Paapi jeevapu yootaku raa || ఓపాపి జీవపు యూటకురా

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Paap Sahit a tu ab sot pas

titles.title: 391.Gadiya nenu thattu chunnaanu || గడియ నేను తట్టుచున్నాను

verse.name: V1
verse.lines: Idigo nenu thalupu nodda niluchundi thattuchunnaanu

titles.title: 392.Yesu raajun nee yadalo || యేసు రాజున్ నీ యెదలో

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16 V17 V18

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Idigo nenu thalupunodda niluchundi thattu chunnaaanu

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Yesu raajun nee yadalo - vasiyimpa neeyavaa ?

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: Nilchi yundagaa paapi! Yesu prema nenchi -

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: Mosa magunu - ipude rakshana dinamu - , venuka rakshanabbadu “Yesu”

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: 4. Pilchi nilchu rakshakuniki thalupunu theeyumu needu jeeva balamula - nede samarpimpumu “Yesu”

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: 5. Repu yani thaamasimpa nashtamu kalgu sadaa - manchi samayamu vrudhaa yagun kastapadedavu “Yesu”

verse.name: V16
verse.lines: 6. Yohaanu moodu padahaarunu vishwasimpumu dappi gonna vaarin pilchun rooka kaasulu lekaye “Yesu”

verse.name: V17
verse.lines: 7. Halleluya paadutakai - vallabhuni yoddaku raa throsiveya dennadunu

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Bhai bahino papiki mafi mang lo

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Pallavi : Sodarudaa paapa kshamakai vedumaa prabhu Yesuni

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 2. Manuja roopamu dharinchi - swargamu digi vachchenu

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: Thanadu rakhtamu dwaaraane - paapa bandhamu thrunchenu “Sodarudaa”

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 4. Samayamu ledu sodaraa - thwarapadi rammu vegame

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: Paapa saagaramu nundi - Yesu prabhu vidipinchunu “Sodarudaa”

titles.title: 394.Yesu prabhuve neeku rakshana || యేసు ప్రభువే - నీకు రక్షణ

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: Pallavi : Yesu prabhuve neeku rakshana nitchunu

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 1. Mruthiye paapapu jeetamu - prabhuni varamu jeevamu

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: Praanamun aasiluvapaini baligaa nidi nin konegadaa

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 2. Kantiki kanabadani venno - cheviki vinabadavi nenno

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: Grahimpa shakyamu kaanivi - neekai sidda parachenu

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: Praanamun aa siluvapaini - baligaa nidi nin konegadaa

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: 3. Marana balamu gala vaanin - naashanamubu chesenu

verse.name: V17
verse.lines: Praanamun aa siluva paini - baligaa nidi nin kone

verse.name: V19
verse.lines: 4. Siluva rakhtamu chetanu - nirdhevu laina vaarini

verse.name: V21
verse.lines: Praanamun aa siluvapaini - baligaa nidi nin konegadaa

verse.name: V25
verse.lines: Praanamun aa siluva paini - baligaa nidi nin konegadaa

verse.name: V29
verse.lines: Praanamun aa siluva paini baligaa nidi nin konegadaa

verse.name: V34
verse.lines: Neevu nee rakshana kai paadumu Halleluya “Yesu”

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Oh paapi sandhinchitivaa - nee paapa vimochakuni

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 1. Baadhimpa bade prabhu Yesu - vidudala jeya ninnu nindanu pondenu - ponda nee vaanandam “O paapi”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 2. Kristu yesu nee korakedche - getsamane vanamulo vaatsalyamutho - ninnaanandimpa jeyun “O paapi”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 3. Rakshakudu theerpukai - niliche akshaya jeeva meeya sikshanu bonde - ninnaandimpa jeya “O paapi”

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 4. Prabhuvaina Yesu thattuchunnaadu - nee hrudaya dwaaramun abbunu shaanthi - therachina hrudayamun “O paapi”

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 5. Jeeva jala mitchu prabhuvaina Yesu - dappigoni yunna neeku jeevithaanthamu varaku - dappigona ne maatramu “O paapi”

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 6. Rakshana durgamuna ninnunchi - shatruvunu anachivesi dakshina hastamutho - kappunu - ninnepudu “O paapi”

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: 7. Devuni swaramu - vinudi nede - daivaputru louduru

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Choodumu sodarudaa neevu - nede lechi rakshana korakai

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: Chimma cheekati janamula gammenu - nemmadi nondaka

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: Nee venuke aajeevamu nilachenu - jeevamu nondaga vegame raa

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: Kalushamu lellanu kadugunu kristu niluchunu ila nee kaapariyai

verse.name: V17
verse.lines: 4. Morra pettumu nede lechi - sarichesukoni jeevitha mantha

verse.name: V18
verse.lines: Parishudda rakhta dhaaralatho - parishuddudu nilachenu neekai

verse.name: V20
verse.lines: 5. Yesuni nammedi vaarilalona - Yesuni jeevam pondina vaarai

verse.name: V21
verse.lines: Bhaasurambugaa moksham jera - nilchedaru shakhtini bondi

verse.name: V23
verse.lines: 6. Halleluya paadumu neede - vallabhundu Yesu vachchunani

verse.name: V24
verse.lines: Ella prajalu choocheda resun - challani prabhu raaka ilalo

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Prabhu thattu kannuleththu Yesu thattu kanuleththu

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 1. Gathadinamula durneethi kriyala mathini neevu maruvumu

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: Paathakamula joopi baapun maa dayaamayu desu “Prabhu”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 2. Chintha padu bhavishyaththunakai emi cheyuda nanchu

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: Sankata dukkhamulanu baapun aashrayame naa Yesu “Prabhu”

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: Bheethi bhayamulatho netula bodu naatho naa prabhuvundan “Prabhu”

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Choodumu neevu melconumu Yesu vachchuchunnaadu

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Andhakaara raajyamuna kaa raaju mahimatho vachchunu

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: Nede ninnu piluchu chunde aalasyamu cheyakumu

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 2. Nede vinumu suvaarthanu pondu goppa rakshana

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: Raadu tharunamu ledu marala - maranamu ninnu koni povun

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 3. Viduvumu andhakaara throva viduvumu nee chedu jeevitamu

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: Nede Yesuninu Viswasinchi - naduva nayatha podunu

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: Paapamu leni Yesu rakhtamu - paapamulanni kadugunu

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: Neevu pondumu nitya jeevamu - lechi paadumu Halleluya

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Yesuni sweekarinchu - kristesuni sweekarinchu nee

titles.title: 400.Jeevitha mevvariki nee jeevitha mevvariki || జీవిత మెవ్వరికి, నీ జీవిత మెవ్వరికి

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Jeevitha mevvariki nee jeevitha mevvariki ?

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 2. Dhanapeksu lendaro galaru - ee dharani yandu

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: Dhanamupai manassu nilpedaru - ee dharani yandu

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: 3. Swantha bodhalakai brathikedaru - ee dharani yandu

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: Garvamunaku ammabadi yunduru - ee dharani yandu

verse.name: V18
verse.lines: 4. Virigina hrudayamulu kalarendaro - ee dharani yandu

verse.name: V19
verse.lines: Karigedu uppuga nundedaru - ee dharani yandu

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16 V17 V18

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Yesu ninnu pilichenu - vaasigaa swaramu vinu -

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: Manasu nilpi daani podavu vedalpu lothu neththu

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 3. Preeti thoda yesu prabhuvu - praanamu narpinche

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: Neekai - deeni valana prema yettido thelisikonumu

titles.title: 402.Choodumu eekshaname calvarini || చూడుము ఈ క్షణమే కల్వరిని
403.Entha paapinainanu - Yesu cherchukonunu || ఎంత పాపినైనను - యేసు చేర్చుకొనును

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: There is life for a look at the Crucified One

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 2. Paapa Bhaaramu mosina rakshakuniche - ne neramu tolagen

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: Jeeva nadhudu karchina raktamuche- nee paapa runamu teeren

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: 3. Ye kriyalu praardhana kanneellunu - ninnu rakshimpa jaalavu

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: 4. Paapa prayashchitta kriyalu mugise - ani prabhuve palkenu

verse.name: V16
verse.lines: Sarvalokapu nera paapamun - siluvalo nivruththi jesen

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 3. Yesu nee theermaanamunakai - vechi yundaga theermaaninchu

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 4. Thagudunaa yani yanu konaka - veru sparsala nondakumu

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: 6. Yeshaya okati padunenimidi - nalabhai aidu iravai rendunu

verse.name: V16
verse.lines: Yesu kristu arachi cheppudaani - aayanan kooda pondumu

verse.name: V17
verse.lines: 7. Yirmiyaa enimidiravaiyunu - rendava corindhi aaru rendunu

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Prabhu Yeshu Bulataa aj papion ko

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Prabhu yesu rammanuchunde - papula nellarini vacchina variki prabhuyesunde - vishrantinichu “Prabhu”

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Lokamulo maanavulella ghora paapamulu jesi devuni mahimaku dooramaipoyiri maanavula neethi kriyalu - muriki pelikale “Prabhu”

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Prabhu Yesu kristu nandu ye papa doshamu ledu mraanupai vreladenuga mana doshamula korakai maranamu gelchi vijayamunichi - neetiga tirche “Prabhu”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Yendaru visvasinturo prabhu vaina kristuni vaare pondedaruga nityamaina rakshana nede meekanukoola samayamu - rakshana dinamu “Prabhu”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 4. Papamunu kshaminchutaku - prabhuke adikaramu kaladu yevari papadoshamulu pariharimpabaduno vaare danyulu paralokamulo nischayamuga “Prabhu”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 5. Paralokapu tandriki putrulu visvasinchina vaaregaa theerpu maranamuleka jeevamu pondedaru

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Yerushalemu gummamulaara rajunu loniki raanimmu chirunavvutho prabhu Yesuni nede aahvaaninchumu

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Vijayudai vachuchunnadu shatru saataanunu odinchi karjoora mattalu vastramu lenduku

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 2. Abhyantara parachakumu pillalu, vruddulu, yauvvanulan prabhuni vijayamunandu varini stuthistotramulu padanimmu “Yerusha”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 3. Nee dhusta kriyalanu batti prabhuni dayanu throsedavaa parama raajunu hrudaya mandiramuna nede raanimmu snehitudaa “Yerusha”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 4. Ninnu darsinchutake prabhu nee chentaku vachchenugaa gaayapadina hastamunu chaachi nee madilo chotimmanenu “Yerusha”

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 5. Paschattapamu nondumu nede nee papamuloppukonumu jeevamu rakshana shaanthi nosagunu

titles.title: 408.Theruvu nee hrudaya dwarambu nede || తెరువు నీ హృదయ ద్వారంబు నేడే

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Pallavi : Theruvu nee hrudaya dwarambu nede - prabhu Yesu nande rakshana kaladu nirlakshyamugaa jeevinchanela (2) -

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 1. Janmambutone paapivi neevu neetimantude ledu kaama, krodaa, lobha, moha papapu daaguliviye “Teru”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 2. Dharmakarmala vastrambu neevu kappukonna daagavu nee paapamu kadigi neetiga theerche owshadambemi ledu “Teru”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 3. Theliyadu neeku nee marana dinamu nischintagaa nundedavaa paapa phalitamu narakame vinumu vidipinchedi vaarewaru ? “Teru”

verse.name: V8

verse.lines: 1. Prabhuvaa neekavideyudanai - palumaarulu padu samayamulo prematho jaali deenaswaramutho - Priyudaa nanu paikethithivi

verse.lines: 4. Swantha thalampuna daaveedu - mandasamu thechchu napudu - ujjaa maranamuche daaveedu - hrudayamunu kadilinchitivi

verse.lines: Tharalinapudu samudramulo munuguchundaga - chepa dwaaraa daricherchitivi

verse.lines: 1. Unnattu nenu vachedan - paapi nainanan pilvagan nee netrucheta gadugumaa - yo gorrepilla devudaa

verse.lines: 2. Unnattu nenu vachedan - ne noppukondu dappulan nee maatalato harinchuma - yo gorrepilla devudaa

verse.lines: 3. Unnattu nenu vachedan - dukkambu baadaparchagan papambu baaya nee yodda - yo gorrepilla devudaa

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 2. Rakshakudu praanamu bettinadi naa korake veremi vaagwaadambulu akkaraye ledu “Ne”

verse.lines: 3. Prathi paapi bayamantayu teerchu naamamide narakadandana yantayu tolaginchu naamamu paapa sankellu anniyu vidagottunu Yesu satanu vaani thalanu Yesu chithuka gotten “Ne”

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: I was laden down with sin

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: 1. Paapabharamu dhustaguna sametundanai - dhulcka nasta dowrjanyamuto nunda chinna swaramu vinabade nannu piluchunatluga rammu pondu naadu silva vishraanthi

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Pallavi : silvalo silvalo - papamella boye silvayanduna baaramella veedenu - ratri pagalaayenu kanugonti silvalo rakshakuni

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Eguchundu nityamu jeevamunu bondanu - silvalo krupashakthi pondudun shodanalu vachina jaya monduchundunu mokarinchi praardintu silvachenta “Silvalo”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Jeevitamandu edpu baadha shodhanalella athma sayamuche silva Juthunu Yesu papikoraku paddapaatlu choodagaa bhaaramula moyushakthi pondudun “Silvalo”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 4. Bhaaramuche krungina paapi nede raarammu Yesu raktamandu ninnu kadugunu nitya jeevamichunu ninnu samarpinchuko

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Dayagala Yesu paapi kaashrayudaa priya prabhu drohini karuninchumu

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. O prabhu neeku virodhamugaa paapamu chesina duritundanu neechudanai ninnu vedinchitin O naadha papini kshaminchumu “Daya”

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Lokaashalanniyu shodhinchagaa naa kayamantayu ksheeninchenu naa kaasrayambu neeve prabhu O naadha papini manninchumu “Daya”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Naa dhanamu ghanamu naa sarvamu naa devaa paapamukai vyayaparachitin O devaa nenu rikthundanu naa duritambulanu baapumaa “Daya”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 4. Andaru naaku banduvulani endaro snehambu chesiri

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: Andaru nannu viduvanganu naa tandri naa kaasrayambimmu“Daya”

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 5. Marugaina naadu papambulaku narakambu naaku sariyainadi

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: Nee raktamuto kadugumaa mari naaku dikkevaru O Yesuvaa “Daya”

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 6. Ee naade nee mata nevindunu ennadu ninnu viduvanu

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Pallavi : Sangha mokkate, saarvathrika sanghamanedi sangha mokkate

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: A.P. : Shirassu nokate shareera mokate - nitya shakhti galginatti

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 1. Ye naruni peruleni sanghamidi - yesiddaanthapu peruleni sanghamu - staana dinamula peru lenididi - elaati peru vahinchani yatti “Sangha”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 2. Yoodulani helleneyulani ledu - sunnathi pondiyunna lekunnanu - desheeyudu paradeshee yani ledu - swaatantrya daasya stree purushudanleni “Sangha”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 3. Aatmaikyamanu yedu petala thraadu - ee thraatiche sanghamu katta badenu - itti jeevamu kalgi lokamunaku - veraina jeevamu jeevinchuchunnatti “Sangha”

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: Nivaasa stalam - naveena varudu raaja nagaramu illu “Sangha”

verse.name: V17
verse.lines: Saarvathrika maina - sanghamunu joopa veelagu nijamu “Sangha”

verse.name: V18
verse.lines: 7. Maru janma mondina vaare ee sanghamu - asamaanu

verse.name: V19
verse.lines: Desude yaddaani shiramu - yogyamugaa naidu sevala

verse.lines: Kattitivi nee daasudai natti Moshe dwaraa nimpitivi

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Glorious things of thee are spoken

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: 1. Deva patnamaa ? siyonu - nee mahaatmya maaditam

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Aadithappa nattivaadu - chese nin swadehamu guttameeda gattabadda - nin gadaltu revvaru rakshanampu godalunna - thruncha vachchu shatrulan

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Shashwathampu brema sooru - jeeva vaari joodumu vaanchithambu lichchi needu - lemulanni baapunu epdu paarune ritunda - dappi gooru newadu nityamaa krupaa ghurambu - kristu daatabolu

verse.name: V6

verse.lines: Nityasoukhya mitchu swastyame - siyonu biddalu aamen

titles.title: 457.O pavanulaaraa - meedu vishwasampu || ఓ పావనులారా - మీరు విశ్వాసంపు

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Yenthentho - stiramainadi - shrestampu vaakya - maa kandamu nitchun - shri Yesu naashrayinchu - shri Yesu naashrayinchu - thannashrayinchuvaare dhanyulu

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Nee ketti vipathu - sambhavimpagaanu - ne neetho nunnaanu bhaya metiki - devudan - ne nee konarthun saayam - naa goppa shakhti thonu - naa goppa shakhti thonu naa goppa shakhti thonu ninnilpudu

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Devaagni pareekshalu - neeku kalgagaanu - krupaa shakhti mendugaa - neekithunu - aa manta ninnu - naavarimpa gaanu - neeloni kalmashambu - neeloni kalmashambu - neeloni kalmashambu - dahinchunu

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 4. Vrudhapyamu nandu - swantha prajalella - naa maarani prema ruchi chooturu - praayamun proddu - grunkunatti velan - ne kougilinthu vaarin - ne kougilinthu vaarin - ne kougilinthu vaarin - naa kougitan

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 5. Naa yandu viswaasa munchu natti yaatman - ne vidvanu shatru koti chetikin - paataala mellan - vani mringa joodan - ne nellavelalandu - ne nellavelalandu

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Ham hain Prabhu ka swargiya gharana

verse.lines: 1. Entha sundaramo prabhuni gruhamu - nalu dikkula

verse.lines: 2. Oka nootana vyakhtigaa mamu jese - parama gruha -

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 3. Nallani thellani vaarani ledu - dhanikulu dharidrulaniyu

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Kalisiya Khrist Yishu ka shariri hai

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 2. Marmamai yunna devuni sankalapamu sanghamu dwara ihamunaku thelipenu evaru viswasinturo vaare dhanyulaguduru "Sangha"

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 3. Devunike kristu Yesu moolamugaa - mahima kalugunu gaaka - thara tharamulu evaru mahima parathuro vaare swastya maguduru "Sangha"

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 4. Kristu Yesu sanghamunu kattu chundagaa prabhala levu paataala dwaaramulu evaru jayamu gaanturo vaare thanatho nunduru "Sangha"

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 5. Vadhuvu sanghamukai kristhu vachchu chundagaa- thaane konipovunu shuddulaina

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: Vaarini evaru sidda padedaro vaare yeththabadedaru"Sangha"

titles.title: 460.Kristesu prabhuvu thana rakhtamichi || క్రీస్తేసు ప్రభువు తనరక్తమిచ్చి

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Krist Yishu Prabhu jis mandali ko

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Kristesu prabhuvu thana rakhtamichi konnatti sanghamuna yevaru cheredaro vaare dhanyulu paralokame vaaridi

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Apostalula bodhanu nammi - stiraparacha badina vaare aatma shakhito vaaru yellappudu - sanghamulo nilichedaru "Kristesu"

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: Kaligiyunduro vaare pondedaru kshemabhivruddhi - kristesu prabhuvu nandu "Kristesu"

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 3. Prabhu deharakhtamunu thini thraagu vaare - thanayandu nilichedaru - prakatinchedaru aayana marana - punarutthaanamunu vaaru "Kristesu"

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 4. Pattu vadalaka sanghamutho koodi - evaru Praadhinchedaro - praardhana dwaraa saataanu kriyalu - bandhinchedaru vaare "Kristesu"

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 5. Kristesu prabhuni raakada koraku - evareduru choochedaro - nityaanandamuto saakshya -

verse.lines: Pattanamu - daaniki manalanu paatrula jesina mana

verse.lines: Mana prabhu Yesu - maranamu dukkhamu vedana

verse.lines: Pallavi: Yehova ninnu asirvadinchi ninnu kapadunu

verse.lines: Gaka krupayu samadhanamu niku kalaga jeyunu

verse.lines: Nidu krupato nannu - deva rakṣimpumu Yehova

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Names of the books in the Bible

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: Pustakamul perlu theliya valenanina daiva krupache vibhajinchi paada valayun

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 2. Paata nibandhana yandali grandhamul - muppadi thommidiyu - mari krotha nibhandhana yanduna - iravai yedu pustakamulunu

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 3. Aadikaandamu - nirgama kandamu leveeyula kaandamu sankhyaa, dwithiyopadesha kaandamul, yehoshuva - nyayaadhi patulu Roothu

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 4. Modati Samooyelu, rendu samooyelu, modati rendu raajulunu - mari okati rendu dinavruthaanthamulunu Ejraa, Nehemyaa, Estheru

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 5. Yobu keertanalu, solomonu saamethal, prasangi, parama geetamu, yeshayaa, irmiyaa, vilaapamulu yehezkelu, Daaniel, Hosheyaa, Yovelu

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 6. Aamosu, obadyaa, yonaa, meeka, nahumu, mari habakooku zephanyaa, haggayi, zekaryaa, malaaki, cheppiti muppai thommidi

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: 7. Maththayi, maarku, lukha, yohan, apostalula karyamulu, romaa, okatirendu korindheeyulu, galatiya, epheseeyulu,

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: 8. Philippiyu Colosseyu, oka thesalonikaiya rendu thessalonikaiyulu, okati rendu thimothy patrikalunu, theethu, philemon patrika

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: 9. Hebreeyulunu, yaakobu, peturu okati rendu patrikalun, yohaanu vraasina patrikalu moodunu yudaa, Prakatanayu

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: 10. Aravai aarunu devuni lcheta - neeyabadina vedamu daani mokaalla meeda praardhana thoda,

titles.title: 472.Kristuni swaramu vindunu prabhuve || క్రీస్తుని స్వరము విందును ప్రభువే

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16 V17

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 2. Balamaina nee swaramu bahu prabhaavamu galadi devadaarula virachunu prajvalimpa cheyunagnini

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 3. Adbutha prabhu swaramu aranyamu kadilinchunu aakula raalajeyunu lella neena jeyunu

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 4. Aalayamandanniyu aayanane ghana parachun aasheervadamu shaanthi nosagu naayana swarame

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: 5. Nee madhura swaramu nee vaakyamuna vindun praaradhanala yanduna pratidinamu palkedavu

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: 6. Nee madhura swaramu nee chittamu thelpunu anudina jeevitamulo anusarincheda ninnu

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: 7. Nee madhura swaramu nee maargamu joopunu kudi yedamala thirigina nee swarame vinabadunu

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: 8. Thuphaanulu kaligi bhaya bheethulalo nunda bhaya padaku manipalike premagala nee swaram

verse.name: V16
verse.lines: 9. Maranaandhakaara loyalo nenunda neeku thodai yunti nanedi swaramunu vintin

verse.name: V17
verse.lines: 10. Prabhuvaa selavimmu nee daasu daalinchun deenudanai nee maata angeekarinchedanu

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 1. Vedamu poorvamu thelipina vidhamuna - nee daasula

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: Naatmatho nimpi karuna saagaraa beedalamagu mammu

titles.title: 474.Aa dinamulalo devokthi - arudaayenu || ఆ దినములలో దేవోక్తి

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: A.P. : Daivokthi pratyakshatha - dorukunade - arudaayenata - aa dinamulalo devokthi

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 1. Ishraayeleeyula kaanaadu - ye raaju leka poye

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: Thana istaanu saaramugaa thirugu chundenu prathivaadu

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 2. Parama thandri mandasamu - cherapattabadi nanduna prabhaavamu poyenu -

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: Sainyamu ladhipathi Yehovaa - sarvadaa thana thodai yunden

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: 5. Lemmu thejarillumu - neeku velugu kaligenu Yehovaa thandri mahima - nee meeda nudayinchenu

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: 6. Yehovaa pattanamani - ishraayelu parishudda devuni sionani - neeku peru pettedaru

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: 1. Mangalamuga paadudi - krupa satyambunu ranguga jnanamichedu divya vaakyamu vijaya satyavedamu - mangala nityadeepamu

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Pallavi : Amruthamu adbuthamu divya satyamu (2 times)

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Suvisheshamunu prakatimpu - krupa satyambunu paapa ghorambu thelpunu - divya vaakyamu paraloka varshamu - jnaana nimpudalayunu “Amrutha”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Devudesu harshinchedu - krupa satyambunu jeeva mangala vaakyamul - divya vaakyamul Yesu nannu choodu - nityamu shuddheekarinchu “Amrutha”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 4. Rendu yanchula khadgamu - krupa satyambunu ullamul kariginchedu divya vaakyamu yochanal

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 5. Aatma kaahaara midiye - krupa satyambunu paapiki jeeva paanamu - divya vaakyamu - paadamulaku deepamu - kaallaku manchi velgunu “Amrutha”

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 6. Viswaasula suvaarthaye - krupa satyambunu nischayamaina punadiye - divya vaakyamu - vidudalanitchu satyamu - unnatha loka satyamu “Amrutha”

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 7. Halleluya paadeda - krupa satyambunu apavitrathanu pogottun divya vaakyamu - prabhuvu naama midiye -

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Anant Yishu ki ham stuti karen

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Nityudesune stutinchu - thana satyamu korakai A. P. : Madyavarthi yaaye chedirina - parishuddulaku thane ilalo

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Megha mandala mantuchunnadi - naaku daahambadi theerchu chunnadi - vegame manujulanu maarchiveyunu- maarchi veyunadiye “Nityadesune”

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Vidudalanu ichunadiye - vidipinchu ghora paapamunundi kadu shramalanadi sweekarinchunu -

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 3. Prudhivi nellayu maaripoyinan - satya mennadu maarane maaradu nityamaina Yesu satyamaaye nilalo satyamaaye nilalo “Nityadesune”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 4. Khadgambu boli koyunadiye - padagottunu dustula nadiye vadi vadigaa thana pani neraverchu nadiye - neraverchunadiye “Nityadesune”

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 5. Udakambu boli kadugu nadiye - addamu boli choopu nadiye adi bangaaru viluva galadi - viluva galadiye “Nityadesune”

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: Oppinchu nadiye krotha thenen boli ruchinchu nadiye

verse.lines: 2. Mana santatipai thana atman - kummarinchunu mana

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: 3. Neeti kaaluvala yodda - niravanji chetla vale

verse.name: V11

verse.lines: Needu maata lakshyapetti - nitya seva jeyanee

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Lord, speak to me that I may speak

verse.lines: 1. Ne bodimpa janaalikin - nerpimpu naaku no prabhu

verse.lines: Nakimmu needu sakthini - nan Dhairya prachumo prabhu

verse.name: V9

verse.name: V12

verse.lines: Vinipinchumu - abhayamu nimmu oh goppa devaa -

verse.lines: 5. Nee vaakyamu agni sutte vantidi - adi rendanchulu gala

verse.name: V22
verse.lines: Nee viswaasyathalo - nee yandu nilachu natlugaa "Nee"

titles.title: 482.Vinipincu prabhu ni svaramunu || వినిపించు ప్రభూ నీ స్వరమును

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 C1 V4 C2 V5 C3 V6 C4 V7 C5 V8 C6

verse.name: V1
verse.lines: Pallavi: Vinipinchu prabhu ni swaramunu - vinucuntu nidasudan 2

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Nerpincu ni vakyamunu - cupincu andu ne naducunatlu 2

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: 1. Vekuvane ne - leci vindunu ni svaramu - uttamamu adi ento 2

verse.name: C1
verse.lines: Dinamantatikai siddhaparacucu - vidipincu addula nundi 2 Vi

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 2. Ni vakyamu cadivi ni svaramu vinucu - ne saricesikondunu 2

verse.name: C2
verse.lines: Ne nerugudunu idiye margamani - nerpumandu naduvanu 2 Vi

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 3. Nato matladu spashtamuga prabhuva - ni svaramu na korake 2

verse.name: C3
verse.lines: Nito manushulato saricesukondunu - ni divya vakyamu dvara 2 Vi

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 4. Ni vakyamu agniyu sutai vantidi - adi vavadiyena khadgam 2

verse.name: C4
verse.lines: A vakyamega adbhuta adam - na nija rupamun cupincunu 2 Vi

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 5. Velli yunnanu ne sramala nundi - nercukonti nandu nundi 2

verse.name: C5
verse.lines: Ponditi jivam a sramala dvara - nilupu nidu visvasatyalo 2 Vi

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 6. Cedhinci sari ceyu ni vakyamega - na hrdaya cedu talampulanu 2

verse.name: C6
verse.lines: Ni svarupamulo nannu malacumu - ni mahima nimpumu nalo 2 Vi

titles.title: 483.Nityamu niluchunadi – devuni vakyamu || నిత్యము - నిలుచునది - దేవుని వాక్యము

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: A. P : Aa vakyame yesu daivamu

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: Prathi manishini veliginchu – mahima velugu adi } 2

verse.name: V21
verse.lines: Thana ishwaryamulo – theerchunu – nee prathi avasaramu – 2

verse.name: V1
verse.lines: Pallavi : Idigo mee devudani – yuda pattanamulaku – prakatinchudi

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Prabhuvagu mana yesu thane – shakthi sampannudai thwaraga vatchunu

verse.name: V3

titles.title: 485.Nadrsti nipai nilipi || నా దృష్టి నీపై నిలిపి

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 C1 V4 V5 C2 V6 V7 C3 V8 V9 C4 V10 V11 V12 C5 V13 V14 V15 C6 V16 V17 V18 C7

verse.name: V1
verse.lines: Pallavi: Na drusti nipai nilipi - nadu yocanalato sadopadesamu sada ne jeseda - naduva nivu na margamuna

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: 1. Maranamu nundi pranamunu niratamu vidipimpanu dharalo

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Jivincan karavulo mari sajivuluga - nitimantulapai prabhu netram

verse.name: C1
verse.lines: Nilucunu nilakadaga yadarthula mora yehova vinulu vinunu vidaka sahanamuto Na drusti

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 2. Yehova netramulu edu - jerubbabelu cetakani gundu nūlun

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: Santosincunu bahu menduganu mahimalo vesenu vinayamuga

verse.name: C2
verse.lines: Mandira punadini mugincunatani cetulu mudamuna jarugunidi daivatmace Na drusti

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Daivasana peddala madhya campinatlunna sajiva gottepilla

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: Yesuni kannulu ninnu kanaga jivincucunnananu koninan

verse.name: C3
verse.lines: Mrtudave nivilalo davanaiyunna vatini sarididdu jagratta yesuni svaramu vinu Na drusti

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 4. Madilo parama prabhuvunerugu - yadardha hrdayula balaparaca

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: Prdivi lo payaninci cūdaga prabhudrsti yehovanu vidi vellenu asa - siriya raju dariki

verse.name: C4
verse.lines: Mati tappi nivu madi vartincitivi - idi modalu niku yud'dhamule Na drusti

verse.name: C5
verse.lines: Devuderugu na yadardhatantayu - tarici tūcunu trasulo Na drusti

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: 6. Edu atmala upadesam - edu saṅghamulu heccarinca

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: Bitito gancu prati netram - podicina varu saha

verse.name: C6
verse.lines: Lokulu rom'munu badukonduru - bahu sid'dhama nivu prabhuni cera Na drusti

verse.name: V16
verse.lines: 7. Prabhu alocana nilucu sada prabhusaṅkalpamu tara taramul

verse.name: V17
verse.lines: Sanstutito nitiparulu kristu sannidhani anandincudi devunilo

verse.name: C7
verse.lines: Ekamai ceyudi ullasa ganamu Na drusti

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Yesuni nammedivaaru aayana uchita krupatho

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: Sevinturu thama prabhuni - ghana paraturu nirathambu

verse.name: V18
verse.lines: 6. Neeti kaaluva yoranu - naata badina vaaralai

verse.name: V19
verse.lines: Meti saaramu kaligi - patchaga nunduru vaaru“Yesuni”

verse.name: V21
verse.lines: Challani prabhu raakadakai - mellagaa vechi yundedaru

verse.name: V19
verse.lines: Kaapaadi - vidudala nitchi intiki nadipi kastamula

verse.name: V22
verse.lines: Prabhuvu - praardhana lella ventane vinuchu - sanghapu

verse.name: V24
verse.lines: 7. Paulunu seelanu kaachi - sangha chintala nellanu

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Anand se bhar kar jaenge ham sab

titles.title: 489.Idigo nenoka nootana kriyanu || ఇదిగో నేనొక నూతన క్రియను

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16 V17 V18

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Dekho main ek naya kaam ab

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Idigo nenoka nootana kriyanu cheyuchunnaanu

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: A. P. : Eenaade adi molachunu daani naalochimparaa

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 1. Adavilo throvanu jesi - edaarilo nadulanu nenu ellappudu

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 2. Naadu prajalu thraagutaku - ne naranyamulo nadulu

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 4. Nootana srustiga ninujesi - nee shaantini nadivale jesi

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: Nanujoochi mahima parachi - stuti baada jesedanu “Idigo”

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: 5. Nene devudanani delasi - naa kaaryamulanu neraverchi

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: 6. Marugaina mannaa nitchi - mari thellani raatintchi

verse.name: V16
verse.lines: Chekkedanaa raati meeda - noka krotha naamamunu“Idigo”

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: A. P. : Varthamaana bhootha bhavishyath kaala

verse.name: V21
verse.lines: Neede - stuti vastramunu neede - ullaasa vastrambu

verse.name: V24
verse.lines: 5. Jalamulalo badi daatu nappudu - balamai yundedanu

verse.name: V25
verse.lines: Nee thodai yundedanu - nadulalo vellu nappudu

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: “Joy of the LORD is your strength”

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Yahowa ka anand hi drirh garh

titles.title: 492.Devudu meeku ellappudu thoduga || దేవుడు మీకు ఎల్లప్పుడు

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Devudu meeku ellappudu thoduga nunnaadu (3)

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 3. Yosepu dweshincha badi napudu - gotilo throya

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: 4. Yerra samudrapu theeramu nandu - Pharo tharimina

verse.name: V23
verse.lines: 7. Paulu bandhincha badi napudu - Peturu cheralo

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 1. Ellanu penta thoda thulyamu - narulellarunu mannai povuduru

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: Ranguga priya Yesu mithrudu naakunda mangalamuga

verse.name: V16
verse.lines: Nundu gaana naa kitchata satatamani etulandunu “Ellappudu”

verse.name: V17
verse.lines: 5. Ee narulu nannu bahuthitti dooshinchina - naa peru

verse.name: V18
verse.lines: Cherupa prayatninchina - badulu cheppanu naa naaluka

verse.name: V24
verse.lines: Vidipoyinanu parama aadarana kartha Yesu venta -

verse.name: V26
verse.lines: 8. Naa mitruni cheyibatti - ne nilthunu - naa shatruni

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: 1. Deva samaadhaanam shanthinadhi vale - pravahinchu chundu

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Dhanya hain we jo - man ke din hain

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Pawitra bano tum bhi, sachchaimen raho abhi

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Parishuddulai yundudi daiva chittamuna perugudi yadhardhulai yundidi

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: Aatankamulemiyu lekunda adugu prashna javaabulalo viduvaka joopumu parishuddhata “Parishu”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 2. Panulalona pratistalamuna parishuddha jeevita mavasaramu prati daarin prati samayamuna panulalo choopumu parishuddhata “Parishu”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 3. Prema aikyatha peruga jeyun shrama dukkhamula doora parachun priyamutho nellaru cheri poru maani korumu parishuddhata “Parishu”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 4. Devuni polina jeevamu joopa kaavalayunu paavana jeevam jeevita veshambu vyardhamu keedunu baapunu parishuddhata “Parishu”

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 5. Shuddha saakshyamu bhadraparachunu iddharanilo siddaparachun shuddhamagu chittambu kalugu shaashwata shuddhi parishuddata “Parishu”

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 6. Neeti thoda jyoti yundina ledu koratha ledu choodan

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: Medinipai niluchu sheshamu vaada memi nikaledu parishuddata “Parishu”

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16 V17 V18

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Premaa premaa - premaa priyudavu neeve - aananda maanandame

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Nee prema ruchiyinchina naade - nannu nenu

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: Vaadi povun - vaadade ayyaa - nee prema -

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: 1. Erigiyuntive - Yehovaa - yesukristunandu nannu - erigi bhoomi punaadulu veyakamunde - aakasamu sahaa lekunnappude ilaparvatamulu nilavakamunde - kanabadu pratidiyu lekunnapude erigi yuntive

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 2. Nirnayinchitive - Yehova - Yesu kristunandu nannu - nirna paramuna kootamu jarugakamunde rakshana veluguku raakunnappude prayaschittapu balikakunnapude - Yesu roopamila nerpadanapude - nirna yinchitive

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 3. Peruna pilchitive - Yehova - Yesu kristunandu nannu - peruna cheta aadamunu cheyakamunde - Hanoku neeto naduvakamunde

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: Novahunu rakshimpakamunde pitrudabramunu piluvakamunde - peruna pilichitivi

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 4. Neetiga tirchitive - Yehova - Yesukristu nandu nannu - neetiga garbamulo ne kalugakamunde - kaalaparimiti kaakunnappude katika chikati kakunnappude -

titles.title: 500.Ne Yesuni velugulo nadichedanu || నే యేసుని వెలుగులో నడిచెదను

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: 1. Ne Yesuni velugulo nadichedanu - ratrimabagalaayanato nadichedanu velgun nadichedanu - vembadinchedanu Yesude naa rakshakudu

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Pallavi : Nadichedane prabhu Yesunito - nadichedane prabhu hastamuto kaantilonundaga jayamgaantunu - Yesune ne vembadinthunu

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Ne Yesuni veluglo nadichedanu - gaadahmbagu cheekatilo bayapadanu aathmato paaduchu saagipovudunu Yesude naa priyundu

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Ne yesuni velugulo nadichedanu velugulo prabhu swaramu ne vinuchundunu . sarvamitchedanu chenta nundedanu

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 4. Ne Yesuni velugulo nadichedanu - dina sahaayamu ne pondedanu sukadukkamaina maranambaina

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 5. Ne Yesuni velugulo nadichedanu - naa drushtini prabhu painunchedanu

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: Silva dwajamune batti velledanu Yesude naachenta nundunu

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Turn hi, tum hi, is jag ki jyothi

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Meere lokamunaku velugu - lokamunku uppu meere

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Manujulu meedu manchi kriyalanu - kani tandrini mahimaparchaga

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: Vinayamuna mee velugu vaariki - kanapadaga prakaasinchudi “Meere”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 2. Kondameeda nundu pattanamu - undaneradu marugai nijamuga dandiga manadu thandri swaroopamu - undaga meelo prakasinchudi “Meere”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 3. Devuni vaakyamu velugai yunnadi - jeevinchudi velugunu kaligi pavanamagu sahavaasamu kaligi - devuni atmato nindi vardilledu “Meere”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 4. Maranachchaayalo meerundagaa - parama velugu prakaasinchenu parugide cheekati velugu dayinchagaa - parishuddaatma phalamulu pondina “Meere”

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 5. Meerikameedata paradesulunu - parajanuluga nundaka yunduru parishuddulato neka pourulai - devuni gruhamuganai yunna“Meere”

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 6. Ratri pagalu bedamuleka - chandruni suryuni kaantiyu leka prabhuvagu devudu prakasinchunu - yuga yugamula kaayana raajyamu “Meere”

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 7. Prabhuvagu devude jeevamai yundiyu uppuga jesenu mimmunu tanakai uppunuboli saaramu kaligi -

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: 1. Balavantudesu mahima - paadi veelagune vivarimpa calvari rakshanaviluva ellarikini dorukunu

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Pallavi : Ha ! rakshanampu baavulellanu anthuleni lotugalavi endipovu ennadainanu chedikondu mennadanduna

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Neelluleni shrama yenthayo - deeni naalochinchare yevvaru viluvaina prabhuni matalanu alakinchi yangeekarinchu

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Uppuneella baavulunnanu ika upayogamu yundadu tappulanni throsiveyumu appude yaanandamabbunu

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 4. Kalahamula maanivetumu manchi -jalamula traagiyaanandintum yellara mekamoudamu tolagadrosi yaddulanniyu

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 5. Jeeva jalamula traginavaru - meeru devuni saakshulai yundudi

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Nene bhayapada koodadanenu a....a.....a... a....a.....a..... sishyulanu dhairyaparachina vaadatade

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Aidu rottelu rendu chepalatone - aidu velanu poshinchinavade addariki vella naajnaapinchina prabhuve - preminchina vaade

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Gaali eduraina dhairyamu viduvaku - anniyu melukai samakudi jarugunu antamu vaaraku thodugha nundunu - moralidi kalavara padakudi

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Lokamulo meeku shramale kalugun - shramale sahajamu narulandarikin shramalo dhairyamu kaliginchutukai - vaaghdhanamu lanniyu nichenu

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 4. Ayane devudu ooraka yundudi - aayanane yerugudi meeru unnatudayane anyajanulalo - mahonnatudu bhoojanamulalo

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 6. Yuddamu cheyunu Yehova - stutinchuta mana vidhi yagunu

titles.title: 504.Manamu Yesu prabhuni mahima || మనము యేసు ప్రభుని మహిమ

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16 V17 V18

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Manamu Yesu prabhuni mahima kanugontimi

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 2. Neevu nammina yedala - devuni mahima chutuvu

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: 6. Mana rakshana kartanu shramato - sampoornuni jeya

verse.name: V16
verse.lines: 7. Mana chulakani shramalu - raabovu mahima yeduta ennataginavi kaavu

titles.title: 505.Devaa ! nee thalampulu naa || దేవా! నీ తలంపులు నా

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Devaa ! nee thalampulu naa kentho priyamu - entho priyamu - vaati moththamu daasuda nagu ne nenchi cheppeda goppadi goppadi

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Paataalapu paashamulu - nannu arikattagaa - aavarinche marana urulu - krungi potino devaa - krungi potino devaa praardhanalo morrapetta - vinitvi naa deena dwani anduke ne paadeda - keertincheda “Devaa”

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Naa meediki lechuvaaru - nannu bedarincheduvaaru devaa

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: Nee rakshana naa nundi daati poyenane vaaru - daatipoye nane vaaru - praardhanalo morrapetta - vinitivi na deena dwani anduke ne paadeda - keertincheda “Devaa”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 3. Neeve naa kaapari nantivi - kaapu dalalo raaleka yuntini paapinai yundi paapa merugananti shaapa grastuda naiti devaa praardhanalo morrapetta - vinitivi naa deena dwani anduke - ne paadeda - keertincheda “Deeva”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 4. Mootha vesina naa morkhathayunu - daagi yundina naa paapamunu vippi choopi shikshimpa nantivi - kaksha leni naa devaa - Kakshaleni naa deva arhatha leni vaadanu -

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: Sarvamu poyina vaadanu anduke ne - paadeda keertincheda “Devaa”

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 5. Nenu nee kattadalanu - nerchukonu natlunu shrama pondi yunduta naaku melani nerpinchitivi - melani nerpinchitivi - nee dharma shaastramu naaku priyamu - dina mella nenu dyaaninthunu anduke ne paadeda - keertincheda “Devaa”

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 6. Parvathamulu tholagi poyinanu - thatharillina mettalu mattamai ottu pettukoni nenu cheppeda vidichipodu nin naadu krupa vidichipodu nin naadu krupa - nee vaakhdaanamulakenaa stotramu naa aartha dwanulu naa hrudaya dhyaanam - angeekarinchu devaa - keertincheda “Devaa”

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: 7. Nenu cheyunadi ipudu - neevu eruga jaalavane thelisikonduvu neevu ika munduku - naa paripoorna maargamide - naa paripoorna maarga mide - vintini ne nee swaramu - kantinine

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 C1 V5 V6 C2 V7 V8 C3 V9 V10 C4 V11 V12 C5

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Yehova vantu ayana janamegada Yakobe svasthyabhagamu 2

verse.name: C1
verse.lines: Avarinchi vani paramarsinchi gache kanupapaga Akasama

verse.name: C2
verse.lines: Anya devatalato nedainanu lekapoye vanilo Akasama

verse.name: C4
verse.lines: Tana yintiki vaccuvari nella prabhudivincu niritin Akasama

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: Samajamuga kuduta maruvaka mariyu miru manaka

verse.name: C5
verse.lines: Prabhuni yinti divena lella pondudi nikkamuga Akasama

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Kristu yesu mana kilalo - nitya - samaadhanamu

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16 V17 V18

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Santo, nahin darna, yuddh hai Yahowa ka

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: Bada joochu chunde - nadivale neepai paara

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: Yeduta nunde - shatruvu ninnu jampa jooche -

titles.title: 511.Bhaya padakumu oh chinna || భయపడకుము ఓ చిన్న మందా

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 1. Thana raajya manthaa nee keeya gori -

verse.name: V18
verse.lines: 5. Thana kumaaruni nee korakeeya venu deeya

verse.name: V19
verse.lines: Ledu nee priya thandri thana swaastya -

verse.name: V24
verse.lines: 7. Siluvalo Yesu chani poyi brathike - geliche

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Thana vaarigane yundumu - manalanu rakshinchenu thanake stuti

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 1. Krupa satya sampoorna vaakyamu - nara roopi yaayenu kanugontimi tnandri mahimanu - janathaika kumaarunilo thana prema adbutha mainadi - manamu koniyaadedamu "Mana"

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 2. Vaaru aayana thattu choodaga velugu kaligenu - manalanu thaane veliginchenu thana vaakyamu dwaaraane Prabhu uttamudani yerigi thanake stuti paadedamu "Mana"

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 3. Daiva putrundu sajeeva raallatho intini kattuchunnaadu devuni

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: Thejamu raagaa - mahimatho ninde gruhamu aayana mandiramulo - thana mahimanu paadedamu "Mana"

verse.lines: 4. Endarini prabhu mundu yerigeno - vaarini nirnayinchenu pilichi neethigaa theerchi mahimaparachenu thana thanayuni roopamitche - mana maananda mondedamu "Mana"

titles.title: 513.Vaaru aayana thattu choodagane || వారు ఆయన తట్టు చూడగానే

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Jinhone Us Ki or drishti ki

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Vaaru aayana thattu choodagane - vaariki velugu kaligenu

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Krupaa satya sampoornudagu prabhuvu kaapaadunu manala prati shodhana nundi choopinchu thana mahima nityamu manaku staapinchunu manalanu thana raajyamugaa

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Kanu gontivaa neevu devuni mahima thana kumaarudaina Yesu prabhuvulo - thana prajalanu vidipimpa kristesu - thanayundai ihamuna janminchenu

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Antya dinambu vachchu chundenu choodu - chintinchedaru paapulandarilalo chintinchuchu nede pashchaataapamutho raa vintha rakshananu pondi aanandintuvu

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 4. Yehovaa thejassu aayana shakhtito - mahimatho mandiramu nindi yundenu - mahaa mahuni paadamula nede vedina mahimaanandamu pondi santasintuvu

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 5. Kristu Yesu prajalaku ee bhuvini neethi sooryudu udayinchunu mendugaa - athani rekkalu aarogyamunitchunu - nityamu santosha gaanamu cheturu

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 6. Rakshimpa badina prabhuni janamaa rakshkudesuni swakeeya dhanamaa rakhtamutho konnatti kristu sanghamaa - mukhti daatanu

titles.title: 522.Nee chentako prabho nejeedan || నీ చెంతకో ప్రభో - నే జేరెదన్

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 3. Aakaasha mandala - margambunu - naa keevu choopumaa- nee koormiche nee divya dootalu - nan gori pilvagaa nee chenta nundunu - naa rakshakaa

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 4. Ne nidraleka nee stotrambutho - shokampu raalluga - bethelunu neekai nirminthunu - naa dukkha manduna nee chenta nundunu - naa rakshakaa

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Munnu naa yaalochana - nedu thana maata munnu varamu korithi - ne dosagu vaanin munnu swastata korithi - nedu vaanine

verse.lines: Pallavi: Yehova vimocincina vare - patalu paducu siyonunaku tirigi vatturu - nityanandamu kaligina varai

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: 1. Prabhuvaina yasu bhulokamuna - maharajai elaga raga

verse.name: C1
verse.lines: Nityanandamuto vijayasucanato - manassuna duḥkhamu nitturpunu leka Yehova

verse.name: C2
verse.lines: Ghanadai yehova mahimanu gancu - prabhukristuni prabhavamunu Yehova

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 3. Gruddiki kannulu cevitiki cevulu - kuntini gentedi duppiga jeya

verse.name: C3
verse.lines: Sundarudaina rajun dendamuna ganci - mugavani naluka padi harsimpa Yehova

verse.name: V9

verse.name: C8

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Erugudunu ni srama dukhahmunu - daridratanu ni daridratanu,

verse.name: V13

titles.title: 555.Prabhu Yesu naa rakshakaa || ప్రభుయేసు నా రక్షకా

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Prabhu Yesu naa rakshakaa - nosagu kannulu naaku nirathamu ne ninnu jooda - alphayu neeve - omegayu neeve

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Priyudaina Yohaanu - pathmaasulo priyamaina yesoo - nee swaroopamu priyamaara joochi - bahu dhanyudayye priya prabhu - ninnu jooda nimmu “Prabhu”

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Lekkaleni maarlu padipotini - dikkuleni vaada ne naitini chakkajesi naa netraalu derachi grakkuna ninnu jooda nimmu “Prabhu”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Erigi yerigi ne chedipotini - Yesu nee gaayamu repitini - mosa poti nenu - drusti dolagiti - daasuda nannu jooda nimmu “Prabhu”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 4. Endaresuni vaipu choochedaro pondedaru velgu mukhamuna sandiyambu leka santoshinchuchu munduku parugethedaru “Prabhu”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 5. Vishwaasa karthaa O Yesu prabhoo - konasaaginchu vaadaa Yesu prabhoo vinayamutho nenu nee vaipu joochuchu visugaka parugetha nerpu “Prabhu”

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 6. Kantiki kanabadani venniyo - cheviki vinabadani venniyo hrudaya gocharamu kaani venniyo siddha parachitivaa naakai ? “Prabhu”

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 7. Loka bhogaalapai naa netraalu Sokakundunatlu krupa joopumu nee mahima divya swaroopa -

titles.title: 556.Oh sarvashakhtudaa - naa satyadevudaa || ఓ సర్వశక్తుడా - నా సత్యదేవుడా

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16 V17 V18

verse.lines: Jeremiah 33:3 - Eph. 3:20 - Isiah 65:24 Sarwashaktiman mere sachche Prabhuji

verse.lines: Pallavi : Oh sarvashakhtudaa - naa satyadevudaa sarvadaa ninu ne smariyintunu

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: A. P. : Aanandame mahaadaanandame - aashcharya karudu

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16 V17

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Neethimanthula praardhana devudaalakinchunu vaaru thamaala vrukshamu vale

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 1. Morapettumu graahyamu kaani goppa sangathulu mariyu goodhamaina sangathula devude thelupun “Neeti”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 2. Gatha kaalamuna kristu perata aduga kuntiri satatamu aanandamonda

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 3. Yehovaa koraku eduru choochi pondudi balamu ihamandu pakshi raajuvale paikeguduru “Neeti”

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 4. Oohinchalenidi shakyam gaanivainatti kriyalanu Yehovaa cheya shakhtimanthudu atyadhikamugaa “Neeti”

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 5. Mimmu viduvanennadu nedabaayananegadaa nammu navamaatrun depudu

verse.name: V1
verse.lines: Nāku moṟṟa peṭṭumu nēnu nīku uttaramiccedanu yirmiyā Jeremiah 33:3

titles.title: 570.Karuninchi thirigi sama koorchu prabhuvaa || కరుణించి తిరిగి - సమకూర్చు ప్రభువా

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Karuna se Prabhuji wapas de jo khoya main

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Karuninchi thirigi sama koorchu prabhuvaa kshamaapana ninnu veduchunnaanu

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: 1. Daaveedu raaju deenudai veda aavanilo bondina nastamulanniyu devaa neevu smakoorchitive “Karuninchi”

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Shatru samoohapu kutantramulatho bothiga nenu nasta paditini mithrudesulo sama koorchumu thandri “Karuninchi”

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 3. Pasaru gongali - cheeda purugulu naashamu chesina pantanu koorchumaa - Yesu prabhoo ninnu veduchunnaanu “Karuninchi”

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 4. Prema santoshaanandamulanu pradhaana yaajakaa pogottukontini - prematho neevu samakoorchumaa “Karuninchi”

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: 5. Paapapu vishamutho naa paatra nindenu prabhu Yesundanu pindini kalupumu paapa maranamunu tholaginchumaa "Karuninchi"

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 6. Aatmeeya somri thanamulo nundi aatma nastamula nenniyo bonditi aatma devaa neevu sama koorchumaa "Karuninchi"

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: 7. Paapamu chesi padiyuna chotun praapuga neevu joopumoa prabhuvaa kopaginchaka naapai krupa joopumaa "Karuninchi"

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 8. Chesina paapamu kappu konaka viswaasamutho oppukondun

verse.name: V17
verse.lines: Theeya badenu nee valana - ne nela nee

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16 V17

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 1. Kolpoitini modati premanu - challaaripoye nee prema naalo-

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 2. Padinavari yaashrayamaa - viduva badina vari sahayundaa

verse.name: V15
verse.lines: 5. Aikyataye naa yabhilaasha - naadu chedunu tolaginchumu

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Param pita ham hath utha kar

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: Pallavi : Paramatandri karamuleththi - stutula narpintumu shiramuleththi swami neekai chuchu chuntimi

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Ujjeeva naatma nosagu niluva sajeeva saakshiga

verse.name: V5

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 2. Dinadinamu ninu shodhinchi - dhukka pettitimi kevalamu shareerulamani - kanikarinchitivi

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: Jaruga janulu dhairyamu chedi - kooli chuchedaru

verse.name: V16
verse.lines: Theri choostoo nee rakadakai - stutula narpintumu

verse.name: V19
verse.lines: Cheta batti rakshana patra - stutula narpintumu

verse.name: V20
verse.lines: 7. Gatabratukulo vatsalyamuna - gaachi ee kshitin nadipe

verse.lines: 1. O maa Yesu vinu maa manavi - maa madyaku

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: Jala dhaaral - nee santatipai aatmanu pampu -

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: 1. Nityamu makai vijnaapana cheyu - nisheedaraatrin priyudaa

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 2. Maa bandhu janulu maa thalli dandrulu

verse.lines: 1. Vishranti nichedu devaa - srama lella theerchamayyaa

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: Daya joopi nanu karuninchi premato adarinchumayya

verse.lines: 4. Nannu cheyi viduvaku naadhaa - nindalenno pondinanu

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: 5. Ashatho nee mukhamunu nenu - aasakhjthitho chooda

verse.name: V3
verse.lines: 1. Oh praardhanaa su praardhanaa - nee prabavambun - maratunaa ?

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Naa prabuvun mukhaamukhin ne branutintu nee prabhun

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: Naa pranamou su praardhanaa - nee -prenambuche gadaa nee

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: Premadaara groludu - no praardhana su praardhana - nee

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: Nee shaantamaina deeptiye - naa shankalella maanupun

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: Nee shakthi nenu maratunaa - naa shaila maina praardhanaa

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: Naa shoka mella deerchedu - visheshamaina praardhanaa - naa shoka

verse.name: V11

verse.name: V12

verse.lines: 4. Aranyamaina bhoomilo - naa ramyamou pisgaa nagamburanguganu

verse.lines: Shariramun vidalchi ne - barambu bovu velalo

verse.lines: Kararnbu ninnu mechedan-bare shu dhyana praaradhanaa-karambu

verse.lines: 1. Yesu naa prabhuva - nee prema lekunna

verse.name: V13
verse.lines: Aanati sisyulu kaniri - nee goppa mahaatmyamunu

verse.name: V14
verse.lines: 4. Naa yandu meeru meelo naa vaakhyamu -

verse.name: V16
verse.lines: Edi istamo daani nadigi - pondumantivi kreestu prabhuvaa

titles.title: 849.Na prana priyuda - ninne stutintun || నా ప్రాణ ప్రియుడా - నిన్నే స్తుతింతున్

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 C1 V5 V6 C2 V7 V8 C3 V9 V10 C4 V11 V12 C5

verse.name: V1
verse.lines: Pallavi: Na prana priyuda - ninne stutintun - na hrdiyara - ninne ghanaparatun,

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Na niriksanaku - adharaṁ nive 2 ellakalaṁ ninne - aradhintun 2

verse.name: C1
verse.lines: Goppa raksananu nakiccenani - koniyadedan 2 Na prana

verse.name: V5
verse.lines: 2. Nadu jivita yatralo naku - jivapu velugu nivaitivi,

verse.name: C2
verse.lines: Nadu kaparivai jivamargamulo nadipitive Na prana

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: Talladillakunda sthiraparace nannu tana saksiga nilipe,

verse.name: C3
verse.lines: Sajivayagamuga nanne niku - arpincedan Na prana

verse.name: V9
verse.lines: 4. Tallidandrulu nannu vidicinanu - • kannillu na kanta ralinanu,

verse.name: C4
verse.lines: Karamulu jodinci pujinceda ninnu na prabhuva Na prana

verse.name: V11
verse.lines: 5. Ninnu viduvanu edabayavantivi - ni aracetilo cekkina prabhuva,

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: Andaru maricina maruvani deva - pogadaka etlundun,

verse.name: C5
verse.lines: Parisuddhulandarito halleluya paduchu kirtintun Na prana

titles.title: 850.Vevela stutulato aradhinceda prabhuva || వేవేల స్తుతులతో ఆరాధించెద ప్రభువా

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 C1 V6 V7 V8 C2 V9 V10 V11 C3

verse.name: C1
verse.lines: Tana raktamuto na papamu kadige 2 Vevela

titles.title: Manava marali ra prabhu centaku || మానవా మరలి రా ప్రభు చెంతకు852.Manava marali ra prabhu centaku || మానవా మరలి రా ప్రభు చెంతకు

properties.verseOrder: V1 V2 V3 V4 V5 V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12

verse.name: V1
verse.lines: Pallavi: Manava marali ra prabhu chentaku cherava?,

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Prabhu pilice tarunamulona - raksincu ninu nedaina (2)

verse.name: V4
verse.lines: Kadasari niriksana idiye - yesayya kaluvari siluve ''Manava''

verse.name: V6
verse.lines: Kadasari niriksana idiye - yesayya kaluvari siluve ''Manava''

verse.name: V7
verse.lines: 3. Papa bharamu toda nindi pagili potunna ni jiva patra,

verse.name: V8
verse.lines: Kadasari niriksana idiye - yesayya kaluvari siluve ''Manava''

verse.name: V10
verse.lines: Garvambu nanacunu yesu virigina hrdayamuto tirugu ''Manava''

verse.name: V12
verse.lines: Jaliga pilice ninu prabhuvu - viluvaina raksana nivva ''Manava''
